question: 1) GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following best explains why it is possible to find nuggets of pure gold and silver in nature, but sodium appears only in compounds? W) Gold and silver are denser than sodium X) Gold and silver are less reactive than sodium Y) Gold and silver are less common than sodium Z) Gold and silver are solids at room temperature
answer: X) GOLD AND SILVER ARE LESS REACTIVE THAN SODIUM
